AT.name: Bayonetta™
AT.description: Das unvergessliche erste Kapitel der Bayonetta-Saga bot 2010 den Einstieg in die so genannte Klimax-Action, eine explosive Mischung aus dynamischer Action und hinreißendem Stil. In jeder Hand und an jedem Fuß eine Waffe haltend, macht Bayonetta ihren Gegnern mit brutalen und dennoch faszinierenden Kombi-Angriffen den Garaus. Wenn du es schaffst, den gegnerischen Angriffen perfekt auszuweichen, aktivierst du die Hexenzeit, und die gelähmten Gegner sind deinen Tritten, Schlägen und Kugeln hilflos ausgeliefert. Fehlt nur noch ein Folterangriff, um ihnen endlich den Garaus zu machen. Kein Engel wird sich Bayonetta in den Weg stellen. Neben dem ursprünglichen Spiel gibt es für Bayonetta diverse Kostüme im Stil von Nintendo, wie eine grüne Tunika, oder die Möglichkeit, wie ein gewisser Kopfgeldjäger durch die Gegend zu rollen und Bomben abzuwerfen. Fest steht, dass die Umbra-Hexe nie besser ausgesehen hat. Dank der Touchscreen-Steuerung des Wii U GamePad und der Möglichkeit, das gesamte Abenteuer ohne Fernseher zu spielen, kannst du Bayonetta näher kommen als je zuvor. Dieses Spiel unterstützt auch Japanisch.

AU.name: Bayonetta™
AU.description: Originally released in 2010, the unforgettable first chapter of the Bayonetta saga introduced the world to "climax action", an explosive blend of dynamic action and saucy style. Armed with a gun in each hand and one on each foot, Bayonetta destroys her opponents with combo attacks that are as beautiful as they are brutal. Dodge enemy attacks with perfect timing to activate Witch Time, leaving your slowed-down opponents defenceless against your barrage of kicks, blows and bullets, then finish them off with a devastating Torture Attack. No angel will stand in Bayonetta’s way. Enhancements to the original game include the addition of several Nintendo-themed costumes for Bayonetta – whether donning a memorable green tunic or rolling around dropping bombs like a famous bounty hunter, the Umbra Witch has never looked better. And with touch controls on the Wii U GamePad and off-TV play for the whole adventure, you can get closer to Bayonetta than ever before. This game also supports Japanese.

BG.name: Bayonetta™
BG.description: Originally released in 2010, the unforgettable first chapter of the Bayonetta saga introduced the world to "climax action", an explosive blend of dynamic action and saucy style. And with touch controls on the Wii U GamePad and off-TV play for the whole adventure, you can get closer to Bayonetta than ever before. This game also supports Japanese.

BE.name: Bayonetta™
BE.description: Sorti en 2010, le premier opus de la saga Bayonetta vous a fait découvrir son action effrénée, un univers à l'action explosive dans un style bien trempé. Avec une arme dans chaque main et sur chaque pied, Bayonetta élimine ses adversaires avec des attaques combo aussi belles que brutales. Évitez les attaques ennemies au bon moment pour activer l'Envoûtement : vos adversaires au ralenti se retrouvent sans défense face à votre echaînement de coups de pieds, de coups de poings et de tirs. Puis achevez-les avec une Attaque sadique. Aucun ange n'arrête Bayonetta ! Par rapport au jeu original, plusieurs costumes Nintendo ont été ajoutés pour Bayonetta : que ce soit en portant une tunique verte mémorable ou en larguant des bombes comme une célèbre chasseuse de primes, la Sorcière de l'Umbra n'a jamais été aussi belle. Et grâce aux commandes tactiles du Wii U GamePad et au mode sans téléviseur pour toute l'aventure, vous pouvez vous rapprocher de Bayonetta encore plus que jamais ! Vous pouvez également jouer à ce jeu en japonais.

ES.name: Bayonetta™
ES.description: La primera entrega de la saga Bayonetta, publicada originalmente en 2010, presentó al mundo el concepto de acción frenética, una explosiva mezcla de acción dinámica y un estilo pícaro. Con un arma en cada mano y pie, Bayonetta destruye a sus oponentes con ataques combo que resultan tan brutales como devastadores. Esquiva los ataques enemigos en el momento adecuado para activar el Tiempo Brujo: dejarás a tus enemigos lentos e indefensos ante tus patadas, golpes y balas. Remátalos a continuación con un ataque tortura. No habrá ángel que se interponga en el camino de Bayonetta. Las mejoras con respecto al juego original incluyen la adición de varios atuendos temáticos para Bayonetta: una hermosa túnica verde, un traje inspirado en una cazarrecompensas... en cualquier caso, la Bruja de Umbra nunca ha estado más guapa. Y gracias a los controles táctiles del Wii U GamePad y al juego sin televisión, podrás sentir a Bayonetta más cerca que nunca. Este juego también está disponible en japonés.

IT.name: Bayonetta™
IT.description: Rilasciato originariamente nel 2010, il primo indimenticabile capitolo della saga di Bayonetta ha introdotto nel mondo il concetto di "azione frenetica", un'esplosiva miscela di azione dinamica e stile vivace. Dotata di un'arma per ogni mano e ogni piede, Bayonetta distrugge i suoi avversari con attacchi combinati belli quanto brutali. Schiva gli attacchi nemici con perfetto tempismo per attivare il Sab. Tem., che rallenterà i tuoi avversari, lasciandoli privi di difese contro l'uragano dei tuoi calci, colpi e proiettili, poi finiscili con un devastante Attacco torturante. Nessun angelo impedirà l'avanzata di Bayonetta. I miglioramenti al gioco originale includono l'aggiunta di diversi costumi a tema Nintendo per Bayonetta - indossando una memorabile tunica verde o lanciando bombe come una famosa cacciatrice di taglie, la Strega di Umbra non ha mai avuto un aspetto migliore. E con i controlli touch sul Wii U GamePad e la possibilità di giocare senza la tv per l'intera avventura, potrai sentirti vicino a Bayonetta come mai prima d'ora. Il gioco è disponibile anche in giapponese.

And with touch controls on the Wii U GamePad and off-TV play for the whole adventure, you can get closer to Bayonetta than ever before. This game also supports Japanese.

NL.name: Bayonetta™
NL.description: Het onvergetelijke eerste deel van de Bayonetta-serie liet de wereld kennismaken met climax action, een explosieve mix van dynamische actie en flamboyante stijl. Gewapend met een pistool in elke hand en aan elke voet vernietigt Bayonetta haar vijanden met combo's die even oogverblindend als dodelijk zijn. Ontwijk vijandelijke aanvallen door op het juiste ogenblik Witch Time te gebruiken, waardoor je vijanden weerloos zijn overgeleverd aan je klappen, schoppen en kogels. Geef he tegenstanders vervolgens de genadeklap met een allesvernietigende Torture Attack. Bayonetta laat zich door geen enkele engel tegenhouden. De oorspronkelijke game is verrijkt met een aantal outfits voor Bayonetta met een Nintendo-thema. Of ze nu een welbekende groene tuniek aantrekt of al bommen gooiend door de levels raast als een beroemde intergalactische premiejager, Bayonetta heeft er nog nooit beter uitgezien. Dankzij de bewegingsbesturing met de Wii U GamePad en de mogelijkheid om de game zonder tv te spelen, kun je de actie intenser beleven dan ooit tevoren. Deze game ondersteunt ook Japans.

NZ.name: Bayonetta™
NZ.description: Originally released in 2010, the unforgettable first chapter of the Bayonetta saga introduced the world to "climax action", an explosive blend of dynamic action and saucy style. Armed with a gun in each hand and one on each foot, Bayonetta destroys her opponents with combo attacks that are as beautiful as they are brutal. Dodge enemy attacks with perfect timing to activate Witch Time, leaving your slowed-down opponents defenceless against your barrage of kicks, blows and bullets, then finish them off with a devastating Torture Attack. PL.name: Bayonetta™
PL.description: Originally released in 2010, the unforgettable first chapter of the Bayonetta saga introduced the world to "climax action", an explosive blend of dynamic action and saucy style. Armed with a gun in each hand and one on each foot, Bayonetta destroys her opponents with combo attacks that are as beautiful as they are brutal. Dodge enemy attacks with perfect timing to activate Witch Time, leaving your slowed-down opponents defenceless against your barrage of kicks, blows and bullets, then finish them off with a devastating Torture Attack. No angel will stand in Bayonetta’s way. Enhancements to the original game include the addition of several Nintendo-themed costumes for Bayonetta – whether donning a memorable green tunic or rolling around dropping bombs like a famous bounty hunter, the Umbra Witch has never looked better. And with touch controls on the Wii U GamePad and off-TV play for the whole adventure, you can get closer to Bayonetta than ever before. This game also supports Japanese.

PT.name: Bayonetta™
PT.description: Lançado originalmente em 2010, o inesquecível primeiro capítulo da saga Bayonetta apresentou ao mundo o conceito de "ação climáctica", oferecendo uma combinação explosiva de ação dinâmica com diálogos e um enredo únicos. Com uma arma em cada pé e em cada braço, a Bayonetta destrói os seus adversários com ataques tão devastadores quanto visualmente deslumbrantes. Esquiva-te de ataques inimigos no momento certo para ativares o Witch Time e os deixares totalmente indefesos face ao teu fluxo de pontapés, socos e balas. Por fim, usa o impiedoso Torture Attack para acabares com eles! O jogo original foi alvo de melhorias, entre elas a inclusão de vários fatos Nintendo para a Bayonetta. Assim, quer envergue a memorável túnica verde do Link quer use a potente armadura da mais famosa caçadora de recompensas intergaláctica, a Umbran Witch apresenta-se visualmente melhor do que nunca. E graças aos controlos por toque de que podes usufruir no Wii U GamePad, assim como à possibilidade de jogar o título exclusivamente neste comando, podes aproximar-te ainda mais de toda a ação de Bayonetta! Este jogo também está disponível em japonês.

RU.name: Bayonetta™
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. Первая часть игры с незабываемой Байонеттой вышла в 2010 году и представляла собой взрывную смесь динамичного экшна и пикантного визуального стиля. С пистолетами в руках и на ногах Байонетта уничтожает противников прекрасными, но в то же время смертоносными комбо-атаками. Уклоняйтесь от вражеских атак в последнюю секунду, чтобы активировать Witch Time и остановить время. Ваши противники останутся без защиты, и вы можете обрушить на них град ударов и пуль, а потом добить их с помощью Torture Attack. Ни один ангел не устоит на пути Байонетты. Дополнения к оригинальной игре включают несколько нарядов для Байонетты в стиле знаковых персонажей Nintendo, например знаменитую зеленую тунику или костюм Стар Фокса. А сенсорное управление на Wii U GamePad и режим игры «Без ТВ» позволят вам по-новому взглянуть на игровой процесс оригинальной игры Bayonetta. Эта игра также поддерживает японский язык.

SE.name: Bayonetta™
SE.description: Originally released in 2010, the unforgettable first chapter of the Bayonetta saga introduced the world to "climax action", an explosive blend of dynamic action and saucy style. Armed with a gun in each hand and one on each foot, Bayonetta destroys her opponents with combo attacks that are as beautiful as they are brutal. Dodge enemy attacks with perfect timing to activate Witch Time, leaving your slowed-down opponents defenceless against your barrage of kicks, blows and bullets, then finish them off with a devastating Torture Attack. No angel will stand in Bayonetta’s way. Enhancements to the original game include the addition of several Nintendo-themed costumes for Bayonetta – whether donning a memorable green tunic or rolling around dropping bombs like a famous bounty hunter, the Umbra Witch has never looked better. And with touch controls on the Wii U GamePad and off-TV play for the whole adventure, you can get closer to Bayonetta than ever before. This game also supports Japanese.
